The Science Behind Mitolyn

6 Exotic Nutrients Clinically Proven to Boost Mitochondrial Function

Every ingredient in Mitolyn is carefully selected and scientifically validated to support healthy mitochondria—the "powerhouses" of your cells that burn fat and produce energy.

Full Ingredient Breakdown

1. Maqui Berry

Promotes Mitochondria

Rich in anthocyanins, particularly delphinidins that activate AMPK enzyme for cellular energy.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Antioxidant support
  • ✓ Healthy heart
  • ✓ Healthy cholesterol

Clinical Support

Cremonini et al. 2024 - Biochem Pharmacol

Read Study →

2. Rhodiola Rosea

Energy & Stress

Adaptogenic herb with 140+ polyphenols that enhance mitochondrial ATP production and reduce fatigue.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Improves mood
  • ✓ Brain health
  • ✓ Enhanced endurance

Clinical Support

Abidov et al. 2003 - Bull Exp Biol Med

Read Study →

3. Haematococcus (Astaxanthin)

Cell Protection

Powerful red antioxidant that protects mitochondria from oxidative stress and enhances fat metabolism during exercise.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Joint health
  • ✓ Immune response
  • ✓ Muscle endurance

Clinical Support

Nishida et al. 2020 - J Cachexia Sarcopenia Muscle

Read Study →

4. Amla (Indian Gooseberry)

Metabolic Health

Rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants that improve mitochondrial function and metabolic parameters.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Healthy digestion
  • ✓ Vision support
  • ✓ Immune boost

Clinical Support

Yamamoto et al. 2016 - Oxid Med Cell Longev

Read Study →

5. Theobroma Cacao

Blood Flow Support

Superfood overflowing with epicatechin, a flavonoid that enhances mitochondrial biogenesis and exercise performance.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Healthy blood pressure
  • ✓ Mood enhancement
  • ✓ Cognitive support

Clinical Support

Taub et al. 2012 - Clin Transl Sci

Read Study →

6. Schisandra

Liver & Energy

Powerful calorie-burning red berries rich in antioxidant compounds that enhance mitochondrial activity.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Liver health
  • ✓ Skin elasticity
  • ✓ Physical endurance

Clinical Support

Kim & Yi 2018 - Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol

Read Study →
